products.title: Infusion Asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc stone grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion Solar Lemon Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. Lemon is a vibrant pastel yellow shade, fantstic for creating a bright summery vibe in your home. Product id: db-nfpl0006 fabric colour: lemon material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Infusion White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The infusion white pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0005 fabric colour: white headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
